title: Seeing gold in a dream with interpretation

preview.html: Many people wonder about seeing gold in a dream, as gold is one of the most precious and precious metals, and is famous for its distinctive shine and sparkle, and therefore deserves to be a source of pride for whoever owns it. Either you keep it or wear it, but seeing it in a dream, Ibn Sirin explained, is not worthy of praise. In the interpretation, especially among men, due to his hatred for his words and yellow color. Interpretation of a dream about gold in a dream, through the site Various. We will learn about seeing gold in a dream in the following lines as follows: Seeing gold in a dream A dream about stealing gold indicates that something ominous is about to happen, whether at work Or at home. Stealing gold from an acquaintance in a dream is interpreted as being beneficial to the thief, but if the thief does not know about it, then there is imminent evil that will affect you. If the thief is unknown, then there is imminent harm that will affect you. And whoever dreams of gold buried in the ground, this It indicates the abundance of sustenance that the dreamer will obtain in his life. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is burying gold in the ground, this indicates the great greed that the dreamer is making in his life and that he wants to snatch everything that is good for him. As for the interpretation of dreaming about white gold and seeing it in A dream has a different meaning than yellow gold. Seeing and carrying white gold is a sign that the dreamer owns something of value and is keeping it and may indicate the presence of a strong person who will keep you in your life. Seeing him selling white gold is undesirable and indicates that the dreamer is ignoring some important things. Very important in his life, such as his wife, children, or work. Also, seeing white gold and not taking it indicates that the Prophet has many important and valuable things, but he does not know their value. Ibn Sirin says that seeing white gold in a dream is a manifestation of opportunities in life and ability. The dreamer is keen to exploit and protect it. If you see yourself buying white gold and storing it or burying it in the ground, this is a sign of providing opportunities and using them well. But dreaming of receiving a gift of gold indicates success and excellence in life as well as achieving future goals. In addition, if you see An unmarried girl: Someone gives her a white gold ring, and if she accepts it, this indicates that she will enjoy good luck in life. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a single woman: Seeing gold in a single woman’s dream differs from that of a married woman as follows: Whoever sees in his dream that he struck a gold vase or jug In a dream, dreaming of a single woman here means that he will get married. And whoever sees that he received a gift of gold will marry a rich, greedy man. As for the one who saw a gold bracelet on her body, that is an inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman, in addition to the fact that women’s jewelry is said to represent Their children, there are many indications that a married woman sees gold in her dreams: A married woman seeing gold is related to her son and a man can refer to a man and a woman can refer to a woman. If a married woman sees a large amount of gold in her dream, this indicates the presence of blessings And goodness in all aspects

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a colorful bird in a dream?

preview.html: Who - who sees a colorful bird in a dream indicates great comfort because it carries beautiful meanings, who among us does not like to see birds with all their wonderful colors and wants to fly high like them, so we find that there are different connotations depending on the change in their colors. A bird, some of which have good intentions and others without it, and this is what our honorable scholars explained in the article. A colorful bird in a dream What is the interpretation of a colorful bird in a dream? The vision indicates the dreamer's high status in his work and achieving a great promotion that puts him at the top without competition with anyone, so his next life will be wonderful and happy. The vision may indicate many sudden changes for him, but it will be very happy and will make him move from his normal state to a much better material state as a result of a lot of money. The dream also expresses the abundance of goodness and blessings that will come to the dreamer's life, which never ends thanks to God Almighty, but rather increases with his interest in the Sharia ruling and his tireless pursuit without doubt or forbidden path. The vision also indicates an increase in profits and many as a result the dreamer enters many new and profitable opportunities, as he has a wonderful creative sense that makes him grow and advance high in his field. Watering the bird in a dream has very nice connotations as it represents resolving the disputes and crises facing the dreamer from their roots and not being affected by any evil in his life again. The dream is also evidence of his success in his studies if he is a student and that he easily achieves the grades he aspires to. Seeing a green bird in a dream indicates progress in life from all aspects, while the red color indicates a successful relationship with the ideal partner who loves him very much. Eating a bird in a dream is a sign of endless goodness that does not end and an increase in blessings in life, especially if it tastes delicious. To see two birds together in a dream in a cage, the dreamer portends happiness and success in all aspects of life. Pecking at the bird in the dreamer's dream leads to the problems and crises that the dreamer sees in his life, but he must be patient and avoid any dispute with others, and if he is bitten by this bird, there are some fears that he feels. Something, but immediately skips it without continuing it. One of the unfortunate signs when you see a dream is that the death of a bird does not bode well, but rather leads to the bad behavior of the dreamer, which he must change to find good in his life and after his death. The vision also indicates that the dreamer is doing actions that do not benefit others, and this is morally reprehensible. He should not harm anyone no matter what happens. On the contrary, he should be more careful about his actions that put him in a bad position with his Lord, because replacing them with better ones has become one of the survivors. You still can't find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for the Egyptian dream interpretation site. What is the interpretation of a colorful bird in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the dream carries promising meanings that make him feel great joy and endless happiness. If the dreamer sees a small bird in a dream, this is a sign of the morals of the dreamer's children and their upbringing

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing basbousa in a dream?

preview.html: Hadout gives you a complete interpretation of seeing basbousa in a dream. You know basbousa – a variety of oriental sweets popular in the Middle East. A dream of an ordinary woman, in addition to the interpretation of a dream about eating basbash for married men and women. Pregnant women, as well as men from the books of the great scholars who interpreted dreams and visions. If you are interested in the interpretation of Baspo’s sleep, just follow this article. What is the interpretation of Ibn Shirin’s vision of Basbousa? The interpretation of seeing Baspo in a dream is complete, as Ibn Sirin explained in his book, Of praiseworthy visions, in terms of the dreamer’s kindness, support, and inclusion in his life. Also, seeing basbash in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer will hear good and happy news and bring joy to his home, God willing. Seeing eating a large amount of basbash in a dream completely shows the dreamer that he was He always tries to achieve many blessings and achieve desires and goals. They ate whole peas in a dream, and their taste was beautiful and delicious. This is evidence of the dreamer’s strength and intelligence, and he always knows good from evil. Seeing someone buying peas in a dream is good news and evidence of improving their circumstances livelihood and the happy changes that will happen to them.See also: Why dream of seeing a full kunafu in a dreamEating basbouzu in a dream, full for an ordinary womanBasbousa in an unmarried girl’s dream is generally a sign of kindness and the emergence of interesting things in her life, as well as being a harbinger of success, success and the fulfillment of desires The dream of eating basbous also appears, and in the girl’s dream it was delicious and beautiful, and this is evidence of her connection to a good person, and God will soon give her a happy marriage. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream full while cooking basbousa is evidence that she achieved what she aspired to, whether it was success or work. Or marriage. The symbol of eating dreams for single people in general is one of her praiseworthy visions that indicate her goodness, support, and blessings in her life. See also: Why do you dream of eating sweets in a dream full? Why dream of eating basbousa for a married woman? Seeing basbousa for a married woman in a dream is complete evidence of a married life Happy, stable, and a sign of improvement in her life. But if she sees in a dream that she is eating spoiled barbash, this is a harbinger of misfortunes and misfortunes in her life, whether with her or with her family members. A husband’s gift to his wife in a complete dream is good news and evidence that the problems between them will end and they will find happiness and love. And familiarity in their future lives. Cooking basbousa in a complete dream for a woman is evidence that she pleases God Almighty and pleases her husband, and evidence of her status and her family. See also: Why does Karim dream in a complete dream? Interpretation of a prenatal visit. The fact that basbousa was eaten, and it was delicious and appetizing, indicates... That she gave birth to a child who will be distinguished by extraordinary beauty and a kind soul. In the dream there is basbozo, which is cream or honey - good news and evidence that she will give birth easily and that she and her fetus are in better health. See also: Why dream of pasta or a judge bites in a dreamInterpretation

title: Interpretation of a bracelet in a dream: the meaning of wearing a bracelet

preview.html: The bracelet in a dream for singles, for pregnant women, for married women, for a dream of a bracelet for a girl, a broken bracelet, loss, loss, purchase, wear, wear, gold, silver and more for Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi and Al-Ma Al-Sadiq The meaning of the bracelet in a dream The bracelet for a woman is commendable because it indicates her marriage to a good man and shows grace and happiness on her hand. As for wearing a bracelet for men, there is no good in it at all; because it indicates control, hardship and imprisonment. The silver bracelet is commendable for men and women; because it indicates religion and piety; because silver bracelets are from the jewelry of the people of Paradise. Bone and ivory bracelets are not useful in it because they indicate despicable and immoral people. Iron bracelets are also not good because they are from the jewels of the inhabitants of Hell. Wooden bracelets are also not good because they indicate hypocrisy The bracelet in a dream | Interpretation of Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi It is stated in the book “Perfume of Sleep in the Interpretation of Dreams”: The man who sees in his dream that he has a bracelet on his hand, then in his wakefulness he lives in distress. If the bracelet is made of gold, it is a good friend or friend, but if the bracelet is made of silver, it is a just wife or daughter, made of iron, copper or tin. It is also said that a gold bracelet is not welcome in a man's dream if he sees himself wearing it or putting it on his wrist. A gold bracelet in a dream is praised for someone who has power, prestige and influence, because it is an expression of justice or goodness, and perhaps the gold bracelet in a merchant's dream indicates profit or blessing, and the bracelet in the ruler's dream indicates victory or conquest, and the bracelet also shows the boy or servant. A gold bracelet in a woman's dream is generally considered a sign of warning and in its interpretation it is a blessing and joy, so if a woman's bracelet in her dream is made of silver, it is better in interpretation. Whoever sees a silver bracelet in his dream, it will not remain for him, and a bracelet made of iron or copper for the man who wears it. The bracelet on the hand of the dead is good because it indicates good character, and the bracelet on the hand of the bachelor indicates the wife. It was said in the interpretation of dreams: Silver bracelets in a dream indicate religion and piety; Because it is one of the ornaments of the people of Paradise. It is not good in interpretation to see bracelets made of bone or ivory, because this may indicate the presence of slaves and humiliation of people, according to the approach of Al-Nabulsi mentioned in his famous book “The Smell of Creatures”. Bracelets in a dream, if they are made of copper, iron or wood, indicate sadness and stagnation. Bracelets in a dream | Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Bracelets in a dream for men indicate distress and worry, and it is worthy of praise in interpretation for a man to see in his dream as if he has a silver bracelet, so its interpretation is for a righteous friend or a righteous son or a generous wife. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing a silver bracelet, and he has an enemy in his wake, God helps him and stabilizes his condition. Silver bracelets in interpretation are commendable when approaching Ibn Sirin, some of them indicate a righteous son and others indicate a generous brother and loyalty to his flock. Interpretation of the bracelet in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq Bracelets in a dream are interpreted in five ways: leadership, wisdom, cunning

Perhaps a golden bracelet in a merchant’s dream indicates profit or blessings, and a bracelet in a ruler’s dream indicates victory or conquest. The bracelet also shows a boy or a servant. It is considered a bracelet. Gold in a woman’s dream in general is a sign of omens and in its interpretation is blessing and joy. If the woman’s bracelet in her dream is made of silver, it is a better interpretation. Whoever sees a silver bracelet in his dream, it will not remain for him, and the iron or copper bracelet is for the man who wears it. The bracelet in The hand of a dead person is good because it indicates good character, and the bracelet on the hand of a single person indicates a wife. It was said in the interpretation of dreams: Silver bracelets in a dream indicate religion and piety; Because it is one of the ornaments of the people of Paradise. It is not a good interpretation to see bracelets made of bone or ivory, because that may indicate the presence of slaves and people who are degrading, according to Al-Nabulsi’s approach mentioned in his famous book “The Smell of Creatures.” Bracelets in a dream, if they are made of copper Or iron or wood, indicating sadness and stagnation. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing a silver bracelet, and has an enemy in his wake, then God will help him and stabilize his condition. Silver bracelets in the interpretation are praiseworthy when Ibn Sirin approaches them. Some of them indicate a good son and others indicate a generous brother and loyalty to his flock. Interpretation of a bracelet in a dream Imam al-Sadiq's bracelets in a dream are interpreted in five ways: leadership, wisdom, and cunning

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing my husband’s feet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about washing my husband's feet in the interpretation of a dream, but by a single diligent researcher seeking to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about washing my husband's feet in a dream Washing the husband's feet in a dream can mean that the woman will fall into some difficulties and crises, and God knows best. The dream of washing the husband's feet in a dream may indicate the end of important problems that have affected his life in recent days. The dream of washing the husband's feet in a dream may indicate happy events that may come their way in the coming period. And God knows best. Seeing yourself washing your husband's feet in a dream may indicate the love and kindness that exists between them at that moment, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about washing my dead husband's clothes in a dream Washing the clothes of a dead husband in a dream may indicate his forgiveness and acquittal of any actions he committed against her. Whoever sees in her dream that she is washing her dead husband's clothes, it may indicate that she is going through a bad psychological crisis and that she needs God Almighty's help. Seeing the washing of the clothes of the dead wife in a dream may indicate the need of the dead for prayer and charity for his soul, and God knows best. The dream of washing the clothes of the deceased in a dream may indicate the payment of debts and the end of the rights that were on his neck, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping my husband in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that her husband has been kidnapped in a dream, this may be a high position that the dreamer can achieve during this time. Kidnapping the husband in a dream may indicate the good changes that occur in their lives during this time, and God knows best. The dream of kidnapping the husband may indicate a difficult calming crisis that the husband is suffering from, and that he will be freed from it in the coming period, thanks to God. Seeing your husband kidnapped in a dream may mean that he is being deceived and deceived by Before the people around him and he should pay attention. Interpretation of a dream about my husband's torn shirt in a dream Seeing the husband's shirt torn in a dream may indicate the changes that occur in the dreamer's life during this period, and God knows best. Seeing the husband's shirt torn in a dream may indicate that he has been afflicted with magic or the evil eye during that period, and he must seek God's help. It is possible that seeing the husband's shirt torn in a dream indicates good events that may occur in the dreamer's life during this period, and God knows best. Seeing a person's shirt torn in a dream may indicate good changes that may occur in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a snake wrapping around my husband in a dream Seeing a snake wrapping around the dreamer's husband may indicate the presence of some differences and problems between them. The snake wrapping around the husband in a dream may indicate that the husband has committed some sins. And God knows best. Seeing a snake wrapped around the wife in a dream may indicate some difficulties that the husband is facing during this time, and God knows best. Dreaming of a snake collar on the husband in a dream may indicate a feeling of weakness and inability to continue on his way, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream that my husband’s friend is harassing me in a dream In the event that one sees the husband’s friend harassing his partner in a dream, this may indicate a lot of sustenance that can come to the dreamer, and God knows best. In the event that one sees a friend

title: More than 11 months, the meaning of a dream about singing in a dream, in detail

preview.html: The meaning of the dream of singing for single people. Holding on to the dream of song. In the dream of an unmarried girl, or an unmarried girl, there are many connotations and interpretations, according to the dream itself. The dream of singing in the dream of an unmarried person indicates good luck and good news if he feels joy while singing. The dream of singing without music in a girl’s dream symbolizes A single woman means an abundance of good fortune and happiness in her next life. Perhaps a dream about singing in an unmarried girl’s dream portends her imminent engagement and marriage to a suitable person. But a dream about hearing a specific person sing in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign that she will marry this person. Meaning of a dream about singing for a woman Married While the dream of singing in a married woman’s dream indicates abundance and abundance of sustenance for her and her husband, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. It symbolizes a dream about a song. In a married woman’s dream, the stability of her marital life and family happiness will permeate her life in the very near future. But the dream of someone singing in a dream is for a married woman The dream of singing in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the stability of her health condition and the ease of childbirth, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The dream of her singing in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the abundance of goodness and abundance. For her and her husband, God willing. But a dream in which she sings incomprehensible words in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of many problems and troubles in pregnancy and childbirth. The meaning of a dream about a man singing states: A dream about a song: In the dream of a single young man, there is abundant goodness, happiness, and joy in his life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But the dream of singing with incomprehensible words in the dream of an unmarried young man indicates the crises and obstacles that he faces in his life. While the dream of singing in the dream of the married man symbolizes the stability of his married life and the abundance of livelihood. But the dream in which he sings with incomprehensible words in the dream of the married man is a sign of strife. And marital problems. Add the dream that you would like to interpret in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it with an explanation of the dreamer’s social status.

title: A detailed interpretation of a man’s white dress in a dream

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of seeing a white man’s clothing in a dream and its meaning in detail. A man always sees in his dream many things that are his own, such as his clothes. The clothes can be a robe, a shirt, pants, or a coat, and this vision is a confusing vision for him, which makes him curious to know the interpretations of this dream, which may be related to an important event in the dreamer’s life, either a happy or unfortunate event, or it may reflect the psychological state that he is going through. With it, either happiness or sadness, but the interpretations of this dream differed depending on the situation. You will find these interpretations in an encyclopedia. Interpretation of a man’s white clothing in a dream. Jurists in dream interpretation agree unanimously that seeing white clothing in general in a dream indicates the observer’s commitment to obeying God and is also an indicator. On the psychological comfort that an individual enjoys. If you see dirty white clothes, this vision indicates that the dreamer will suffer from anxiety and sadness. One of the connotations of seeing white clothes in a dream is that it is a sign of repentance to God, and refraining from committing sins and disobedience. If the dreamer dreams That he buys white clothes, this dream indicates goodness and abundance. For a single man to see white clothes indicates that he will marry a girl on the basis of morals and religion, and it may indicate that he will find a new job opportunity or succeed in studying, and God knows best. Seeing a man wearing a white dress in a dream in a state of clothing White dress: If a man sees that he is wearing a white dress made of silk, then this vision indicates the high status that he acquires in reality. If you wear white pants, this vision indicates that you will obtain a promotion at work, and God knows best. This vision carries other interpretations, as it is a sign To a lawful life, and it also indicates the collapse of worries and problems. A white man’s dress in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a white dress in a dream for a single woman generally indicates the high morals that she enjoys. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is buying white clothes for men, this vision shows goodness and nourishment. And it may indicate her engagement or marriage soon, and God knows best. If you see men’s colored clothes turning white, this vision indicates the collapse of problems and worries. This vision also shows the health and well-being that the dreamer enjoys in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a married woman: a vision White clothes in general in a dream for a married woman mean kindness and sustenance. If a married woman sees that she is washing her husband’s white clothes, this vision indicates that she is keeping the secrets of her home. If a married woman sees that her husband is wearing white clothes, this vision shows how much her husband loves her One of the indications of seeing white clothes in a dream is that it is a sign that you will visit the Kaaba soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a white man’s clothes for a pregnant woman: Seeing general white clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the safety of the fetus’s health and is good news for facilitating her pregnancy, and God knows best. This vision indicates the safety of the fetus’ health. On the commitment of the visionary to obey God and the justice of His conditions. We present to you the most prominent interpretations of R

title: Interpretation of eating pomegranates in a dream by leading scholars, eating pomegranate seeds in a dream, and eating red pomegranates in a dream

preview.html: What did Ibn Sirin say in the interpretation of eating pomegranate in a dream? Pomegranate is considered one of the delicious fruits, and the dreamer can see that he is eating it in his dream, and according to its taste, color and size, he will know the meaning of the vision, and because this symbol often appears in dreams, we will interpret its meaning and know its most accurate meanings through this article within an Egyptian website specialized in interpreting dreams and visions. Eating pomegranate in a dream When the dreamer eats pomegranate fruits and finds their taste beautiful and sweet, and continues to eat them until the end of the dream, the Lord of the Worlds will grant him a lot of happiness and good news, and thus there is no room for sorrows. His life after this vision, God willing. If the dreamer opens the pomegranate himself and eats the seeds inside, he is a person who loves responsibility and leadership as he is known among people for strength and courage. If the dreamer sees that he is eating a pomegranate full of seeds and its taste is good, then his share in the world is full of friends whose intentions are pure and who love him from the bottom of their hearts. The dream can carry a strong connotation, which is the dreamer's ability to make a decision about his personal, emotional, professional or material life, and this decision is correct and he will enjoy many benefits because of it. Eating pomegranate in a dream by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer cuts the pomegranate and pours all its seeds into several bowls and gives them to all his family members to enjoy its beautiful taste, then this is a wedding or a happy occasion that the whole house will witness and he can make it. Or do his work, and this will also change the atmosphere in the house from depression and anxiety to joy and positive energy. Whoever eats a rotten pomegranate in his dream and its taste is disgusting, he will face difficulties in his material and personal life in general, as he will be surrounded by disputes and worries and feel upset. Sometimes an inedible pomegranate indicates illness, a penny, or a quarrel with relatives and acquaintances. It is known that pomegranate fruit is not easy to eat like apples, bananas, etc., but it needs some effort to make it ready to eat. Pomegranate and eating it in a dream, he is tired and trying in his life to get lawful money, and he will find blessings and livelihood at every step in his life. Eating pomegranate in a dream for Imam al-Sadiq Imam al-Sadiq said: Pomegranate is a promising symbol, as long as it is delicious, and if the dreamer sees a large number of pomegranates, he was collecting them in his bag until he takes them and returns home. He is one of the honorable people at work and has a unique mark in his work because God has put a creative taste in him. Thus, the dream indicates that the dreamer's reputation will be good and he may gain a large share of fame in his life. When a bachelor dreams that he has eaten a delicious pomegranate, this is a close marriage and the girl who will be from his division and his partner is characterized by a beautiful, cheerful, comfortable and happy face and you will find with her. What you do not know about eating pomegranate in a dream Eating pomegranate in a dream for a single woman Sweet pomegranate is a symbol of a young man with a beautiful face and beautiful morals, whom the dreamer meets after a few days or a few weeks and gives her a lot of love. Whoever suffered from a serious illness in her life and ate a delicious pomegranate in her dream, the disease will end and she will pass through

title: The 9 most important interpretations of seeing light in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing light in a dream? Insight and clarity of things. What does it mean to see a man in a dream turning on the light at night? Showing his strength and determination. What is the interpretation of seeing light in a married woman’s dream? Data on childbearing and pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing light in a pregnant woman’s dream? Details of an infant What is the interpretation of weak light? Evidence of poverty and distress. Interpretation of a dream about light by Ibn Sirin. Seeing light in a dream is evidence of insight and clarity of matters. Seeing light in a dream means that some old problems that the dreamer is suffering from will be solved. After that, seeing light coming out From the car in a dream is evidence of an experience you have with your life partner. Then, to see sunlight suggests searching for a solution to some issues and problems that he is going through. Seeing a dream of light for free If a girl sees in a dream that the light is on, this is a sign of her desire to achieve goals. It is Then, seeing a white light in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of marriage in the near future. A girl who sees that she failed to turn on the light indicates the problems she faces. After that, when seeing a girl who failed to turn on the light, he will face failure in a romantic relationship. Interpretation Dream of a light for a man: Seeing a man in a dream that he turns on the light at night indicates his strength and determination. Then seeing the light of the apartment lit is evidence of getting rid of problems and fears. Seeing the light of a poor person in a dream is a sign of wealth and a lot of money that he will obtain. Then seeing the man And he turning off the light is a sign of great sadness. Seeing a light dream for a married woman. The light in a married woman’s dream is evidence of childbearing and pregnancy. If she sees the husband turning on the light, this indicates getting rid of trouble. A married woman who sees her house without light or darkness is evidence of disagreement between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about light for a pregnant woman. Light in a pregnant woman’s sleep is evidence of the presence of a male child. If a pregnant woman sees that she cannot turn on the light, this indicates some problems during pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about light by Al-Nabulsi. Light in a dream indicates guidance, repentance, and avoiding sins. Light in a dream It denotes pride and honor. Then whoever sees in a dream that he is lighting many lamps, this indicates the death of anxiety. If one sees that he is illuminating the path, he will be able to make a decision on an important matter. The light in the dream may indicate improved economic conditions, because it is an indicator On the abundance of food. Then seeing a weak light is evidence of poverty and distress. Whoever sees in a dream that the light has gone out, this is a sign of death. Seeing a red light in a dream means that there are enemies waiting for the dreamer. If you see an inability to turn on the light, it may indicate This leads to a malfunction.
